title: Health chief's stern warning: 'We will not tolerate anybody putting the community at risk'
description: Australia's Chief Medical Officer Professor Brendan Murphy acknowledges the Government has put "really draconian" measures in place, but has done so due to a "very, very steep growth" in coronavirus cases.
content:
Posted 
March 25, 2020 03:08:36
Australia's Chief Medical Officer has warned people returning from overseas that they need to take self-isolation measures seriously amid a "very, very steep growth" in coronavirus cases.
